verses.text: For, behold, in those \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, and in that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, when I shall bring \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*,

I will also \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and will bring them \w down|strong="H3381"\w* into the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, and will \w plead|strong="H8199"\w* with them there for my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* and \add for\add* my \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, whom they have \w scattered|strong="H6340"\w* among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and \w parted|strong="H2505"\w* my \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And they have \w cast|strong="H3032"\w* \w lots|strong="H1486"\w* for my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; and have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* a \w boy|strong="H3206"\w* for an \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*, and \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* a \w girl|strong="H3207"\w* for \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, that they might \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

Yea, and what have ye to do with me, O \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*, and \w Zidon|strong="H6721"\w*, and all the \w coasts|strong="H1552"\w* of \w Palestine|strong="H6429"\w*? will ye \w render|strong="H7999"\w* me a \w recompence|strong="H1576"\w*? and if ye \w recompense|strong="H1580"\w* me, \w swiftly|strong="H7031"\w* \add and\add* \w speedily|strong="H4120"\w* will I \w return|strong="H7725"\w* your \w recompence|strong="H1576"\w* upon your own \w head|strong="H7218"\w*;

Because ye have \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* my \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and my \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and have \w carried|strong="H0935"\w* into your \w temples|strong="H1964"\w* my \w goodly|strong="H2896"\w* pleasant \w things|strong="H4261"\w*:\f + \fr 3.5 \ft pleasant: Heb. desirable\f*

The \w children|strong="H1121"\w* also of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* have ye \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* unto the \w Grecians|strong="H3125"\w*, that ye might remove them \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from their \w border|strong="H1366"\w*.\f + \fr 3.6 \ft the Grecians: Heb. the sons of the Grecians\f*

Behold, I will \w raise|strong="H5782"\w* them out of the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* whither ye have \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* them, and will \w return|strong="H7725"\w* your \w recompence|strong="H1576"\w* upon your own \w head|strong="H7218"\w*:

And I will \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* your \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and your \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and they shall \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* them to the \w Sabeans|strong="H7615"\w*, to a \w people|strong="H1471"\w* far \w off|strong="H7350"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*.

¶ \w Proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* ye this among the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*; \w Prepare|strong="H6942"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, wake \w up|strong="H5782"\w* the mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w*, let all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* draw \w near|strong="H5066"\w*; let them come \w up|strong="H5927"\w*:\f + \fr 3.9 \ft Prepare: Heb. Sanctify\f*

\w Beat|strong="H3807"\w* your \w plowshares|strong="H0855"\w* into \w swords|strong="H2719"\w*, and your \w pruninghooks|strong="H4211"\w* into \w spears|strong="H7420"\w*: let the \w weak|strong="H2523"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am\add* \w strong|strong="H1368"\w*.\f + \fr 3.10 \ft pruninghooks: or, scythes\f*

\w Assemble|strong="H5789"\w* yourselves, and \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, all ye \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and gather yourselves \w together|strong="H6908"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*: thither cause thy mighty \w ones|strong="H1368"\w* to come \w down|strong="H5181"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 3.11 \ft cause…: or, the \+nd LORD\+nd* shall bring down\f*

Let the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* be \w wakened|strong="H5782"\w*, and come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*: for there will I \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* to \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* all the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

\w Put|strong="H7971"\w* ye in the \w sickle|strong="H4038"\w*, for the \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* is \w ripe|strong="H1310"\w*: \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, get you \w down|strong="H3381"\w*; for the \w press|strong="H1660"\w* is \w full|strong="H4390"\w*, the \w fats|strong="H3342"\w* \w overflow|strong="H7783"\w*; for their \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* \add is\add* \w great|strong="H7227"\w*.

\w Multitudes|strong="H1995"\w*, \w multitudes|strong="H1995"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w decision|strong="H2742"\w*: for the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w decision|strong="H2742"\w*.\f + \fr 3.14 \ft decision: or, concision, or, threshing\f*

The \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* and the \w moon|strong="H3394"\w* shall be \w darkened|strong="H6937"\w*, and the \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* shall \w withdraw|strong="H0622"\w* their \w shining|strong="H5051"\w*.

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* also shall \w roar|strong="H7580"\w* out of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and \w utter|strong="H5414"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* from \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; and the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* and the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w shake|strong="H7493"\w*: but the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add will be\add* the \w hope|strong="H4268"\w* of his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and the \w strength|strong="H4581"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.  +  r 3.16  t hope: Heb. place of repair, or, harbour *

So shall ye \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w dwelling|strong="H7931"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*: then shall \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* be \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*, and there shall no \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w* her any more.\f + \fr 3.17 \ft holy: Heb. holiness\f*

¶ And it shall come to pass in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add that\add* the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* shall drop \w down|strong="H5197"\w* new \w wine|strong="H6071"\w*, and the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* shall \w flow|strong="H3212"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w*, and all the \w rivers|strong="H0650"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* shall \w flow|strong="H3212"\w* with \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, and a \w fountain|strong="H4599"\w* shall come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and shall \w water|strong="H8248"\w* the \w valley|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Shittim|strong="H7851"\w*.\f + \fr 3.18 \ft flow: Heb. go\f*

\w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* shall be a \w desolation|strong="H8077"\w*, and \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* shall be a \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, for the \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* \add against\add* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, because they have \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* in their \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

But \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* from \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* to \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*.\f + \fr 3.20 \ft dwell: or, abide\f*

For I will \w cleanse|strong="H5352"\w* their \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \add that\add* I have not \w cleansed|strong="H5352"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w dwelleth|strong="H7931"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.\f + \fr 3.21 \ft for the…: or, even I the \+nd LORD\+nd* that\f*
